4319090.name: Lantern Fish
4319090.description:
Bring light to the deepest depths of the ocean to save the world from an impending darkness. Find companionship as you traverse the ocean floor, saving desperate creatures, rescuing mermaids, liberating ancient kingdoms, and thwarting world-ending cults. But beware—the deeper you descend, the more disturbing the journey becomes. Become the Lantern Fish in this whimsical 2D hand-drawn adventure!

Core Game Features

  • Defeat boss creatures to obtain new abilities

  • New abilities unlock new areas and secrets in the world

  • Choose Your Path (Mega-Man inspired. Where one boss's obtainable skills is super effective against another.)

  • Master swapping between abilities sets to maximize damage while coating yourself in shields

  • Open World

  • A cute pet companion! (Cat-Fish. seriously, it's a cat!)
4319090.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
